actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to repeal the recently added requirement that each State's approved medicaid plan include the State's consent to certain suits.

summary.text: Amends Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to repeal the requirement that State plans for medical assistance include consent by the State to the exercise of Federal judicial power with respect to suits brought against the State by or on behalf of any provider of services regarding the payment of the reasonable cost of inpatient hospital services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to repeal the recently added requirement that each State's approved medicaid plan include the State's consent to certain suits.
